articles.title: Billie Eilish: 'I was ghosted. It was insane' - BBC.com
articles.description: The singer said that someone she had planned to meet simply stopped texting her.
articles.content:
She may be one of music's biggest stars, but it turns out even Billie Eilish is not immune to being ghosted.
The American artist, 22, told the BBC podcast Miss Me? that she had "a crazy ghosting hap… [+3447 chars]

articles.author: Lexi Carson
articles.title: Taylor Swift Stops Mid-Song to Help a Fan in Distress at Edinburgh Eras Tour Show - Variety
articles.description: Taylor Swift stopped her concert in Edinburgh, Scotland, on Friday to help a fan in distress.
articles.content:
Taylor Swift stopped her concert in Edinburgh, Scotland, on Friday to help a fan.
